about_the_game:
If you are tired of the normal everyday adult games with virtually the same stories and cliches- then I invite you to try something fresh, unique, and darker. Like all Anaxverse games, this one revolves around corruption and transformation fetishes! Giggle Night: Trixie’s Trial is essentially an adults-only sexual Visual Novel and Video Game. Following the perspective of the brand-new A.C.E. Sidekick, Trixie Goodwin, a rich story unfolds before you. It allows a choice between a Story Mode (avoiding all turn-based combat and resource management) for casual play, or a Game Mode for those that want to play the Superhero Missions as Trixie as you traverse supervillain lairs defeating their henchmen and gaining new moves. GN:TT is canonical and chronologically 3rd in the Anaxverse series. However, it is completely stand alone as well, and can be enjoyed just as much even without the other previous tales.



You have a choice, like in all Anaxverse games. Do you want to relax, kick back, and simply enjoy the compelling and interesting story, avoiding things like stats, maps, and battles? Then, choose Story Mode! However, if you want to try and juggle resources, learn new fighting techniques, and explore New York City’s supervillain lairs - you can choose Game Mode (begins at chapter 6) and test your skills!



Like the Anaxverse tales of the last ten years, Giggle Night: Trixie’s Trial is no different when it comes to the rich and abundant lore. The creator, being autistic, takes every piece of canon incredibly seriously. Colorful and creepy characters paint the pages with personality. Once you start the game, you may not want to put it down until you reach the end of the dark and compelling story.



The main gameplay aspect of GN:TT (Game Mode) is playing as the fledgling sidekick, Trixie, as she tries to become a superhero, fighting henchmen and navigating through maps. By defeating the underlings and then facing off against some of the most powerful supervillains around, you gain insight into your new powers. By utilizing different defensive and aggressive stances, you will be able to defeat the myriads of mutants. Ultimately, you will reach the Giggle Night and have to face off against the Giggler and his mutant clowns, the Giggle Gang!



Whether in Story Mode or Game Mode, your mission is clear, help Trixie grow sure of herself, learn her powers, and defeat every supervillain from S.I.N. However, like all Anaxverse games, Giggle Night also features the Bad End Menu. Here you can witness all the hundreds of ways that Trix can fail. Watch her go from superhero to mutant breeder as she is corrupted and transformed in long erotic “what if” scenarios. Think of it as a gallery of sorts. But wait! There's more! As with all my Anaxverse games, there are commissioned Bad Ends purchased by fans and added for your pleasure. You can find these in the menu as well. In all, the final version of this title will take hours to finish, and you are bound to find a lot of fun along the way. So, what are you waiting for? Step into the dark, sexy Anaxverse and let me turn your fears- into your fetishes!

content_descriptors.notes: This erotic horror/fantasy/sci-fi game is focused towards corruption and transformation fetishes. It contains explicit sex (sexual assault/non-consensual), BDSM, sex with monsters, drug/alcohol abuse, and depicts a suicide. It also has blood and other common horror trope elements, and there are depictions of violence.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Giggle Night: Trixie's Trial

  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Giggle Night: Trixie's Trial is essentially an adults-only sexual canonical Anaxverse Visual Novel in Story Mode with RPG elements if playing in Game Mode. It tells the story from the perspective of a female superhero named Trixie Goodwin, and features corruption and transformation fetish fantasy.
